sentences.en: Burns played the bemused , tolerant observer of Allen's inconsequential ravings.
sentences.cn: 艾伦断断续续地胡编胡诌,伯恩斯则充当茫然无措、百事相容的搭档.

sentences.en: For ten seconds let us regard with discreet scrutiny some inconsequential objecct in the other direction.
sentences.cn: 为了不致冒昧,让我们花十秒钟功夫瞧瞧另一方面无关紧要的东西吧.

sentences.en: For ten seconds let us regard with discreet scrutiny some inconsequential object in the other direction.
sentences.cn: 现在,别着急,先让我们花个十秒钟从另一角度审慎地思索一下某些无关紧要的事.

sentences.en: His work seems trivial and inconsequential.
sentences.cn: 他的工作似乎琐碎、不重要.

sentences.en: HP infection isn't inconsequential in men.
sentences.cn: HP感染对男性并非无关紧要.

sentences.en: In the wired portion of its journey, a file of such infinitesimal size is inconsequential.
sentences.cn: 在其有线之旅中, 如此微不足道的文件是无关紧要的.

sentences.en: It is not inconsequential to kill 100,000 people.
It is not trivial and inconsequential as some would have you think.
sentences.cn: 普通法并非像有些人告诉你的那样既琐碎又杂乱无章.

sentences.en: Most of these individuals are unknown and living a seemingly inconsequential life.
sentences.cn: 这些人中大部分是不知名的,以似乎微不足道的方式生活.

sentences.en: Seemingly inconsequential details can sometimes contain significant clues.
sentences.cn: 貌似无足轻重的细节有时可能隐含着重大的线索。

sentences.en: So understanding the need for the change was the limiting factor. Programming it was inconsequential.
sentences.cn: 因此,了解改动的需求才是真正的限制因素,编写代码本身则无关紧要.

sentences.en: The choice of the reference temperature is inconsequential.
sentences.cn: 基准温度的选择是无关紧要的.

sentences.en: We are not dismissing resource problems as inconsequential to development.
sentences.cn: 我们并不把资源问题贬为对发展无关紧要的问题.

sentences.en: What I have to say about her 1990 self - description, when she was only 22, is inconsequential.
sentences.cn: 她这本自传于1990年出版, 当时才不过22岁.我对自传的看法并不重要.

sentences.en: Your objections are inconsequential and may be disregarded.
sentences.cn: 你的反对意见并不重要,不会受到重视.

words.tran_cn: 矛盾地，不合理地；不切题地
不重要的；不合理的；不合逻辑的

trans.tran_cn: 不重要的，无足轻重的，不值得考虑的
